Posts.Content: I have pain also.Have had chemotherapy, lumpectomy and radiotherapy finishing last August. My elbows,ribs and breast bone are tender although a mammogram and bone scan show nothing sinister which is fantastic. Wondered if this is common and how it can be dealt with other than paracetamol and ibuprofen.Feel ninety something and a bit miserable!!!
Posts.Title: Problems after treatment has finished
